search.query: index=main ansible_task.name="* | * | PATCH | *" earliest=-30d | stats count by ansible_host | fields - count

index=main ansible_task.name="* | * | PATCH | *" earliest=-30d ansible_result.changed=* ansible_host=win19-srv1 ansible_task.tags{}=* ansible_host=$computer_token$ | stats first(timestamp) AS ScanDate by session

index=main ansible_task.name="* | * | PATCH | *" earliest=-30d | eval benchmark_details=split('ansible_task.name'," | ") | eval ScanID=session, BenchmarkID=mvindex(benchmark_details,1) | stats count by BenchmarkID | fields - count
index=main ansible_task.name="* | * | PATCH | *" earliest=-30d | stats count by "ansible_task.tags{}" | fields - count
index=main ansible_task.name="* | $benchmark_token$ | PATCH | *" ansible_result.changed="false" ansible_host=$computer_token$ ansible_task.tags{}=$tags_token$ session=$scan_token$ | stats count
index=main ansible_task.name="* | $benchmark_token$ | PATCH | *" ansible_result.changed="true" ansible_host=$computer_token$ ansible_task.tags{}=$tags_token$ session=$scan_token$ | stats count

index=main ansible_task.name="* | $benchmark_token$ | PATCH | *" ansible_result.changed=$status_token$ ansible_host=$computer_token$ ansible_task.tags{}=$tags_token$ session=$scan_token$ | eval Status=if('ansible_result.changed'=="false","Pass","FAIL") | stats count by Status

index=main ansible_task.name="* | $benchmark_token$ | PATCH | *" ansible_result.changed=$status_token$ ansible_host=$computer_token$ ansible_task.tags{}=$tags_token$ session=$scan_token$ | eval benchmark_details=split('ansible_task.name'," | ") | eval ScanID=session, ComputerName=ansible_host, BenchmarkID=mvindex(benchmark_details,1), Scored=if(mvindex(benchmark_details,0)=="SCORED","true","false"), BenchmarkName=mvindex(benchmark_details,3), Status=if('ansible_result.changed'=="false","Pass","FAIL"), Tags='ansible_task.tags{}', TaskStatus=status | table ScanID, ComputerName, BenchmarkID, BenchmarkName, Scored, Status, TaskStatus, Tags
